apps.name: NodeJSCluster
apps.globalDefinition: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine. Node.js uses an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model that makes it lightweight and efficient.
apps.specificDefinition: A single instance of Node.js runs in a single thread. To take advantage of multi-core systems, this application use Nodeâ€™s cluster library.
